text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking great with 7 ft @14s WNW swell and light 12 mph S winds. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are your best bets, especially during their optimal tide windows. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 3 ft @10s WSW with moderate 15 mph S winds, still offering some fun options. Day after, conditions worsen with 4 ft @10s W swell and fresh 20 mph SSW winds, making it less inviting. Best: today.
